choices: Somepony finds you before you even make up your mind.
1111.content:
You were a typical teenager who likes playing First Person Shooters and watching violent movies. One thing different from other teenagers is that you secretly liked My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. You don't really know what got you hooked on that girls show but you couldn't care less. It was entertaining for you to watch and it was well worth wasting your time.

One day while you were busy looking through your spam folder in your email, you come across a suspicious looking email that stood out to all your other ones. The subject line just read 'My Little Pony Lost Episode'. Being the curious teenager that you were, you double-clicked on the email only to be stopped by a warning asking you if you want to download a file. You nervously click the ‘yes’ button and wait for the download finish. The format was in mp4 format so you’re guessing that it’s legit. After some time, the video automatically opens in full screen and begins to play. You anxiously watch your computer monitor

The first few seconds of the video were blank before suddenly a picture of a smiling Twilight Sparkle appeared seemingly looking straight at the camera. It didn’t creep you out yet as Twilight wasn’t wearing a creepy smile but a perfectly natural smile that you’ve seen her do in several episodes. Twilight just stood there for several seconds until her mouth moved to say something.

“Hello?”

The sudden disturbance of silence slightly surprises you but you soon get over it. You’re not sure if she’s talking to you or something so you decide to speak back to the monitor.

“Are you talking to me?” you ask.

“Of course I am!” came a reply, “I’m just here to test a teleportation spell and I decided to use it on you. You would want to try it?” Twilight said with a forced smile hoping you would want to volunteer.

“Sure thing,” you reply not really sure if it would actually work.

“Thanks,” Twilight replies, “Now all you have to do is stay still for a few seconds an-.” You don’t get hear the remaining part of sentence as you pass out.

--------------

You regain consiousness and find yourself in a deep forest. You have a slight idea where you are but you don't know where Ponyville is. All you want to do now is get back to Twilight and say that the spell worked. Only problem is that you're lost.
1111.title: Good huh?

A walet containing nothing that you thought would be useful here, a knockoff leatherman, some change, some dental floss and the keys to your house and Honda POS. You really thought you were fucked until you saw something you recognized immediatly: Zecora's hut. You weren't sure how she'd react to seeing a human for the first time, but you really needed some help.

1111311.content:
You turned to face a white horse with wings and a unicorn horn on her head. She also wears a crown and has an image of the sun on her backside. You recognized her as Princess Celestia of this world. You're glad that you see a friendly face as a first sign since arriving here. You then see Celestia taking a closer look at you and it's making you have a funny feeling inside you.

"I had never seen a creature like you before. What are you and what is your name?" Celestia wondered.

"My name is (your name here) and I'm a human from the planet Earth." You explained.

"Then why are you here in Equestria?" Celestia asked.

"Twilight Sparkle. She said to me that she was working on a teleportation spell and wants me to help her try it out and you can guess that it worked well, so to speak." You explained.

"Really? I'll have to talk to her later." Celestia suggested.

"So should I. I mean, I have to tell her that the spell works and hopefully she'll let me go home." You said.

"Nonsense, (your name here)! You are more than welcomed to stay as long as you want to. Come with me. I'll take you to my castle where you'll stay in." Celestia suggested.

"Thanks! Let's go, uuuhhhh?" You know her name, but you don't want her to get any suspicions.

"Princess Celestia. But, you may call me Celestia, if you want." Celestia said.

"Okay then. Let's go, Celestia." You said.

You and Celestia made it to the castle and you decided to check out the place. You then noticed Celestia
1111311.title: A Friendly Royal Greeting

11113111.content:
"Just tell me next time you decided to use that spell on someone outside of Equestria. Okay, Twilight?" Celestia suggested to her student.

"I understand. Sorry for not telling you." Twilight apologized to the princess.

They turned to see you coming in and they smiled to see you.

"Hello, (your name here). Glad to see you." Celestia said

"Yes. You too. So, what's going on here?" You wondered.

"We were talking about the teleportation spell I did on you and were wondering if you want to come to Ponyville with me for a while." Twilight suggested.

"Sure. I don't mind. Who knows? It could be fun." You said.

"Good. Enjoy yourself there and I hope you two will be good friends." Celestia said.

"I have a feeling we will." You said with a smile.

"Great! Let's go." Twilight said.

You go with Twilight out of the castle, but not before giving Celestia a lovely smile, which she returned back to you. You and Twilight made it to Ponyville and she introduced you to her friends, Applejack, Rainbow Dash, Pinkie Pie, Rarity, Fluttershy and Spike the dragon.

"What a interesting creature you brought here, Twilight." Rarity said.

"I'll say. Is he friendly?" Fluttershy asked.

"He sure is." Twilight answered.

"I think we all will get along just find. Right, Partner?" Applejack suggested.

"I bet we will." You said.

"This is gonna be so awesome." Rainbow Dash said.

"Let's party!" Pinkie Pie yelled out.

The ponies enjoy the party and you think that you could get used to this place.

1111311111.title: Heart and Hooves Day

11113111112.content:
You see the purple dragon, Spike, holding a red gem in his claws and you go up to see him.

"Hey, Spike. What's with the gem?" You wondered.

"Hey, (your name here). I'm just giving this gem to Rarity for Hearts and Hooves Day." Spike said.

"Why? You like her or something?" You wondered with a smirk.

"No!........yes." Spike said while blushing.

You know that it's strange for a dragon to be in love with a unicorn, but you don't see anything wrong with that. Besides, you're a human who has a crush on a alicorn that's named Celestia. Maybe, you can join Spike on his way to Rarity to figure if it's good to be in love with the princess or not.

"Hey, Spike!" You called out.

"Yeah?" Spike answered.

"I was wondering if i could join you." You suggested.

"Sure thing, pal. Let's go." Spike said.

You and Spike go straight to see Rarity doing some designing until she was done.

"Oh! (your name here)! Spike! How are you two doing today?" Rarity asked nicely.

"Good, Rarity. I'm here to give you this since today's Hearts and Hooves Day." Spike said giving Rarity the gem.

"Oh, Spikey-Wikey! It's so gorgeous! I'm so happy that you give this to me. I'll treasure it always." Rarity said before giving Spike a hug that makes hearts float around him.

You smiled at the sight and maybe it would be okay to like Celestia. You two say your goodbyes before you head off to see Twilight at her house. You helped her with organising her books and you want to ask her about your love for thr sun princess.

"Hey, Twilight?" You called out.

"Yeah, (your name here)?" Twilight answered.

"I want to tell you something, but you have to keep this between us." You suggested.

"I promise. What is it?" Twilight wondered.

"Well, the thing is, oh boy. Okay. I think I'm in love with Princess Celestia." You said.

"WHAT?!" Twilight yelled in shock.

"Shhhh! It's true and I went with Spike to see Rarity so that I can at least get a hint if it's okay since we're both different species and all." You said.

"Well, I don't see an issue with that." Twilight said.

"That's what I was thinking, but still-." You stopped when you hear the door being knocked by someone.

"Come in." Twilight said.

You two see Spike coming in

"You're welcome. I'm sure that-." Fluttershy stopped when someone said.

"TWILIGHT!!"

You three turned to see a royal guard running towards you. He stops and takes a moment to breathe.

"Miss Twilight! There's a terrible situation happening!" The guard said.

"What is it? What's wrong?" Twilight asked nervously.

"It's Princess Celestia! I'm afraid she's been ponynapped!" The guard said.

You three were shocked when you heard the news. You were scared mostly at the thought of whatever might happen to her. You decided to go find this menace and bring Celestia home safely.

"Do you know who it was?" You asked the guard.

"Yes. It was

1111311111211.content:
"Looks like Queen Chrysalis wants Celestia for her to feed with her Changlings." Twilight said.

"Okay. Twilight, Fluttershy. You girls go get the others and I'll meet you at the entrance." You suggested.

"You got it. See you there." Twilight said before she and Fluttershy go get their friends and you go to the Ponyville entrance.

You waited there until the entire Mane 6 arrived. Even Spike agrees to go so he can protect Rarity while giving you guys some extra fire power. You and the others go into the Everfree Forest and go on that path for a while until you reached Chrysalis's castle.

"Okay, everypony. There's gonna be Changlings in there. So, be prepared for anything they throw at you." Twilight ordered.

"You got it." You and the others said.

You, Spike and the ponies go into the fortress with caution and you see a huge door with 2 changlings guarding the door.

"I've got two changlings guarding the door. That must be where Celestia's being kept." You said.

"Got it. We're gonna need a distraction. Pinkie Pie, you're up." Twilight said.

"You got it." Pinkie Pie said before going to the gaurds.

They see her and Pinkie does some tricks that seriously got their attention.

"Hey, Changlings? You want a taste of me? Come and get some of me." Pinkie Pie dared.

The guards chased after her and you go towards the door to open it.

"Hopefully, she'll catch up with us as soon as possible. Let's go." You said before you abd the others went inside.

You entered the throne room and see Celestia trapped in a cocoon. You ran up to her to see if she's alright.

"Celestia! Hang on. We're gonna get you out of there." You said before about to break the cocoon until.

"Well, well. I had a feeling you would be here, Human. And I see that you brought the Mane 6 with you. How predictable of you to do so." Someone one said until it was revealed to be Queen Chrysalis.

"Let her go. Now!" You ordered.

"Oh. I will. After, I'm through feeding her love away. Speaking of which, I've noticed that you have a lot of love in you, Human. Good. You'll be our main course." Chrysalis said evilly.

"The only thing you'll be eating from us is our dust!" Rainbow Dash said not backing down with her friends.

"We shall see. My army! Attack!" Chrysalis commanded.

Her changlings come out and they fly to attack you guys.

"Let's do this, everypony. Charge!" Twilight said before she, you and and the others charged into battle to save Celestia.
1111311111211.title: Celestia Rescue Mission

11113111112111.content:
You, Spike and the mane 6 charged in at Queen Chrysalis and her changeling army. You punched and kicked a few changlings as Twilight uses her magic to blast some away. Rainbow Dash uses her quickness to evade the changlings and have them tire themselves out. Rarity and Spike do a combo move as Spike breathe fire at the changlings and Rarity uses her magic to have the fire surround the enemy before burning them to the ground. Rarity and Spike smiled at each other for a good job on that team attack.

"You're a knight in shining armor, Spikey-Wikey. Or, scaling armor, in this case." Rarity commented to her dragon lover.

"All in a day's work. Now, let's go help the others." Spike said and Rarity nodded before going to help.

Applejack was kicking strong against the changlings, but she find herself out numbered against them as they surrounded the orange earth pony. She thought she was finished, but then they got blasted by something and she turns to see Pinkie Pierre coming back for them and she even brought her party cannon with her.

"Took ya long enough, Pinkie." Applejack said.

"Good thing I was able get this baby before coming back." Pinkie Pie said.

They turned to see more changlings coming in and Pinkie Pie looks at her cannon as an idea comes around.

"Applejack. This maybe crazy, but I think I have an idea. Fire this cannon with me in it at them." Pinkie Pie said as she puts on her helmet and gets inside her cannon.

"Say what?! Are you crazy, Pinkie?!" Applejack said in shock.

"Trust me." Pinkie Pie said.

Applejack didn't want to do it, but she got behind the cannon and points at the oncoming changlings.

"Okay, Pinkie. I trust ya. Fire in the holl!" Applejack said before fire Pinkie out.

Pinkie was shooting straight at them and she flips to do a strong pony kick at them. She connects and she landed on the ground safely with the now unconscious changlings.

"Pinkie! Are you alright?" Applejack asked in concern for her friend.

"You bet I am. That was awesome!" Pinkie said with enthusiasm.

Applejack smiled and shaked her head at Pinkie's time of joy.

Back at your fight, you and Twilight took out the last of the changlings before going to free Celestia.

"Okay. Here goes." Twilight said using her magic to get Celestia free from the cocoon.

You go to check on her and see that she's alright.

"Are you okay, Celestia?" You asked.

"I believe so." Celestia said weakly as she slowly gets up.

"We need to get out of here!" Twilight said before taking Celestia.

"Go. I'm right behind you." You said following Celestia and Twilight to the exit until.

"No!" Queen Chrysalis said before grabbing you with her magic. "I am right behind you." The queen said before pulling you in.

"(your name here)!" Celestia yelled.

You were dragged onto the ground and you got up to be face-to-face with Chrysalis.

"It is you and me now, Human." Chrysalis challenged you.

"Not for long." You said with no fear
11113111112111.title: The fight for the alicorn you love

111131111121111.content:
You and Chrysalis charged at each other and Celestia and the mane 6 just watched as you're fighting in, what could be, the biggest education challenge of your life. You know that they wanted to help you, but something inside of you is telling you that you need to do this fight on your own. You throw your attacks at the changling queen while dodging hers. The fight goes on before Chrysalis rams you down into a hole underground with her.

"(your name here)!" Twilight said as she and the others followed you below ground.

You get up after the fall as you are covered in cuts and blood as battle scars while Chrysalis gets up too. You're breathing in and out heavily as you go to make another attack. Chrysalis dodged your punch and uses her magic to knock you back down onto the ground. You barely got back up on your feet to show that you won't go down like this.

"I must admit, Human. Your resilience is quite astounding, but I'm afraid that this is the end for you." Chrysalis said before hitting you again.

Twilight, Celestia, and the others got down below and was shocked and horrified that you're getting hurt so badly. Celestia was scared the most that your about to be destroyed be the evil queen. You keep on showing your never-ending desire to survive, but it looks like things are still going bad as you feel your life being drained.

"I wonder how you keep on fighting me like this. Perhaps, it's the strong love you have inside you. Question is, for who? I believe that it is Princess Celestia. Am I right?" Chrysalis wondered evilly.

Celestia was shocked to hear that from her. Is it true that you have deep feelings for the princess of the sun? You looked at the mares as Chrysalis gave you another beating. The mares can't take it anymore as they charged in to help you, but Chrysalis created a barrier to prevent that from happening. They just stand there and watched you get annihilated.

"I guess that is quite understandable. I mean, who can't take their eyes off of a princess like her, anyway?" Chrysalis wondered.

"What does that supposed to mean?" You asked weakly.

"It means that you only want to be with her because she's only a princess and it would mean that you'll have a highest honor for yourself. It is a fact that you cannot deny." Chrysalis said.

The mane 6 and Celestia begins to burn with the same question. Do you really only like her because of her status? Well, all except for Twilight. You chuckled at her opinion and you're about have get second thoughts.

"It's because she's only a princess? Then you must be the world's dumbest queen ever." You said with a weak smile.

"What?!" Chrysalis said in shock.

Celestia, Twilight, and the others were surprised at what you just said to her. You slowly sit back up to look at Chrysalis in the eye.

"If you think that's the only reason, then you're wrong. That's not the reason at all. I mean, sure, her being one is cool and awesome, but the true reason I like her is not because of her status. It's because of "who" she really is. To me, she's the most caring, kind-hearted, and loyal alicorn I had ever met. She watches over the ponies and unicorns day in and day out with a smile and she always take care of her subjects. She has the makings of a true princess, friend and, most of all, a member of a family. That family is right next to her right now." You turned to see Twilight and her friends with a touched Celestia. "She admires those mares as if they're her little sisters and won't let anything happen to them. The same goes for me. She's been a real friend to me ever since I arrived here. That's what I admire her the most. The good heart she has inside of her and I will not let her down no matter what." You said with love and defiance.

Celestia was so touched by your words that she ended up crying up tears and Twilight smiled lightly at your motivation to not let Celestia get hurt. You willed your way back on your feet and Chrysalis was standing in awe at your act of resiliency.

"So, hear this. As long as I have blood flowing through my body, I will not give up on them. You here me, Chrysalis? I will never quit!" You said with bravery.

That's when something strange happened. Back at Ponyville, the container that holds the Elements of Harmony begins to light up and their powers shoots out towards where you are. It reached you and you feel their power surging in you.

"What the hay?" Rainbow Dash gasped.

"What in tarnation?" Apple jack gasped.

"Twilight? Isn't that?" Rarity wondered.

"It is. The Elements of Harmony! But, how is this possible?" Twilight wondered in disbelief of what's going on.

"What is this?" Celestia wondered in shock.

As you gain power from the elements, your wounds begin to heal and your right arm gets a sun logo like Celestia's, only it shines with gold. You then begin to burn with flames and you start to grow wings of fire on your back and then gain a white robe with gold linings around it. You opened your eyes to reveal a shining yellow on your pupils and you appeared to be flying while Chrysalis was watching your transformation feeling something she'd never thought she would feel, pure fear. You spread your new wings very wide and the mares were in awe and shock at your new power.

"What sort of trickery is this?!" Chrysalis asked in shock.

"No trickery. It's the real deal. Time for you to meet your fate." You declared as you grew a flaming sword in your hand.

Chrysalis goes in for a huge attack and you blocked it with ease. She was petrified at you power as you swung your sword to send flaming waves at her. It hits her and was sent back hard. The mane 6 and Celestia was gapping in awe at the new gained power you acquired as you fly down in front of Chrysalis with you arm and hand sticking out at her.

"You feed off of love to gain powerful yourself. Well, guess what? Love hurts and so is this." You said as you created a giant fire blast at her and Chrysalis was sent flying out of her castle while screaming. You stand triumphant before you passed out and you returned back to normal when the flames disappeared. The mares go over to you and Celestia uses her magic to get you on her back.

"Let's get going now, girls. He needs some rest." Twilight suggested.

The mares nodded and they start walking back to the castle with your unconscious body. Celestia was inspired by the power you gained to defeat Chrysalis. However, she was also feeling touched in her heart hen you revealed your love for her. One thing's for sure, there's a lot to discuss when you wake up.
111131111121111.title: The Showdown: You vs Chrysalis

1111311111211111.content: You wake up to notice The Mane Six and Celestia looking down at you "Are you ok?" asked Celestia worried "I think so" you moaned "I wonder how (insert name here) was able to use the elements THINK OF THE RESEARCH" yelled Twilight " Maybe we should let him rest for now" said Celestia. *Please add*

11113111112111111.title: Rest

choices: Stay with Twilight to practice your magic
Go see Rainbow Dash for flying lessons
11113111112111112.content:
“Well, you’re right about me needing rest, Celestia. It’s been a long day for all of us. But, I’d say we do this research of yours first thing in the morning, Twilight.” You said.

“Of course. I’ll see you tomorrow morning.” Twilight said before she and her friends leave.

“(Your name)?” Celestia said.

You looked at her and was surprised to see her kissing you on the lips. It feels really good before she let you go.

“Thank you.” Celestia said with a smile before she left too.

All you did was smile in return before you drifted off to sleep.

Morning came and you’re at Twilight’s place to begin the research on the powers you had required. You two had tried everything to see how they work, but it was all a failure.

“I don’t get it. We tried every single method we can think of and nothing. What are we doing wrong?” Twilight wondered as you thought of something.

“Hmm. Well, the elements do represent the magic of friendship. Right?” You said.

“Yeah?” Twilight answered.

“Well, during that fight, I did feel strongly positive from my emotions. Maybe it only responds to positive thinking and feeling. Let’s try that.” You suggested.

You then took a deep breath and let all things that is good go through your mind and body. That’s when the magic came and you and Twilight were in awe to see it work as you lifted up a box with the magic.

“It worked! It actually worked!” You said to your amazing.

“Astonishing!” Twilight said before she noticed something. “(Your name)! Look behind you!” Twilight said.

You turned to see the same pair of wings that you used in your fight and it’s amazing how they look on you.

“I’ve got wings! This is awesome!” You cheered.

You then wondered on what you should do now.
11113111112111112.title: Research

You and Twilight grew worried as you see Spike was crying in sadness and you two want to know why.

"Spike?" Twilight asked in concern.

I think I was being carried around inside that warmth and I felt loved and I didn’t want to leave that place, but now I am here and I have you two.” You said looking back up at Rainbow Dash and saw her face red and smiling for she knew that warmth was inside her womb.

“Okay come on champs up we go.” She coughed before opening her wings and taking off as did Scootaloo. You watched for a moment before copying them but you didn’t get to far off the ground before there was a thud. This sound made the other two stop and. Look back to see your face planted in the ground before your body folded over and hit the ground. This sight made Dash bolt to you and pick you up. “Raindrop I am sorry I forgot I have to still teach you how to fly. I am sorry my little droplet.” She cooed you as your eyes where all watery before you started to cry like a baby filly. She carried you all the way up to the cloud you now call home and landed. “It okay it only a scratch and bruise.” She tried to comfort you as your words where still ringing in her mind making her deep red as she thought in how she felt holding you inside her being your mother to be. She with out thinking sat down and slowly curled your body up and held you comfortably against her belly fur. This made you calm down for your ear was against her fur and you could hear the familiar sound of her heart beat and this soothes you. You reached a hoof out to Scootaloo who took it and snuggled in with you and Dash gently lowered her body over both of us just being able to cover us with her entire body and drooping her wings to help. All three of us blushing from this moment but Rainbow Dash most for she was remembering being pregnant with you and thinking of doing it again with both of you together.

“Let’s get inside and prune those wings okay my little filly.” The silence was finally broken by Dash’s voice as she stood up making the two of us shiver lightly at the cooler breeze that hit us compared to the warmth of our mother’s body. We followed her inside and sat as she started to tend to the feathers on both of our wings slowly. It felt nice and relaxing feeling her breath on your wings as she adjusted and put each feather back in their propper place and removing any broken ones.

13212122121211212.content:
The moment that Rainbow Dash notice we had fallen asleep to the wonderful feeling of a mother tending to use her children. She gently moved away before the two of you and took off. She flew to Twilight’s castle and rushed to her side. “Twilight, something is wrong with me.” She said before falling to the ground almost in tears. “I love them, I really do but as I was tending to their wings I felt empty inside from where Raindrop was inside me. I need her inside me, but I want Scootaloo as well. Twilight help me.” She stated as she lowered her head and wrapped her wings around to hold herself as if she still held You inside her.

Twilight watched her friend and was worried it was a side effect of the spell and it going off and changing on its own. “Rainbow I can’t put them inside you, I mean the spell already acted up once. It can be dangerious to try again.” She said as she tries to comfort her friend who was a mess on the floor. Eventually she got her friend to calm down “feeling better Dash?” She asked as she sat there next to her and sighed as she saw the sadness in her friend.

“I know it is wrong, I do and I don’t know why I can’t help but need this.” She said lowering her head again. “I look at them and feel a longing that I can’t explain or resist.” She stated feeling ashamed of herself as a parent and a guardian. She wants to give the two of you the best life she can but she is having a hard time with this feeling. “Twilight do something and make this feeling end or help me.”
13212122121211212.title: Sleep with Scootaloo while Dash goes back to Tw...

132121221212112121.content:
Taking a deep breath Twilight’s horn started to glow as she thought of the spell she was to cast very carefully so not to mess it up this time. “I am sorry girls. Please don’t be mad at me.” She whispered to herself as her eyes glowed before a beam hit Rainbow and she could feel her body expanding to accept not one but two fouls inside her before shrinking down so her body could adjust. Breathing heavily Twilight laid down. “There it is done and you will bare them for 6 months if the spell doesn’t play up.” She panted as she rested her head.

Rainbow Fash walked over towards her friend and helped her up and hugged her. “Thank you; Twi I love you.” She said blushing deeply as her wings moved to rubbed her small bulge of a belly. She helped to her room and laid her in her bed before laying with her and cuddling in with her. “Twi your like the father or second mother.” She cooed happily as Twi fell asleep to her friends words and to tired from the spell.

A few hours later Twilight woke up with her head gently resting on Dash’s belly and her wing gently combing her mane. “Hey Twi.” She said softly with a bit of shock as she stopped what she was doing and looked away. “Um, you feeling better?” She asked as she shyly looked back at her before looking away.

Twilight blushed as she felt the firm and warmth of her pregnant friends belly and then the words she said before sunk in making her blush deeply as she closed her eyes as she just took in the warmth. “I am sorry little fillies but thank you.” She whispered before looking up at Dash and then looked away. “May... Maybe it wasn’t the empty ness of not having them inside you that you felt? Maybe it was emptiness in your heart that you didn’t have any pony to share them with as a family?” She said shyly and timidly as she felt her friends heart start to race with her’s on each word she spoke. Twi wasn’t sure what she was saying anymore, all she knew was how she was feeling at this moment. Is it a miss fire of the spell or it being cast twice so soon that it is making her feel like a parent herselve for placing the fouls inside her friend. “Dash, I don’t understand why but thank you. Your words are..” She stumbles off shakily as she closed her eyes unsure what was happening to her. Maybe her mentor would know and could explain it to her better.

Apple jack and Rarity visited the castle with their sisters wondering if Twilight knew where Dash and Scootaloo where. Spike took them to them and they all just stood at the door and stared at their friends, but then noticed Where Twilight’s head was and how swollen Dash’s belly was. “Twi, what is going on sugar cube? We came wondering if you knew where Scootaloo was for she wasn’t in school and the fillies where looking for her. Why is Dash...” She was stopped there by the look on Twi’s face as she rubbed her head in Dash’s belly before sitting up.

“I have a lot to explain.” Twilight stated as she called them all over to sit on her bed with them. She took a deep breath then told everyone of how Dash was and the spell and how it seems to have effected the two of them and where Raindrop and Scootaloo where.

“So let me get this straight. Scootaloo is inside Rainbow Fash as her foul along with Raindrop?” Apple Bloom asked as her and Sweety Bell both put a hoof on Dash’s belly. They both then turned to their sisters and leaped at them with a longing in their eyes. “Sis?” She stated before snuggling into her. “We have no parents for they are gone so I don’t know the feeling of having a mother. Could you please.” She asked Apple Jack and sweety did the same to her sister besides the fact their mother is alive she spends more time with her sister then their own parents.

1321212212121121211.content:
After arguing over it for quite some time the girls gave in and agreed. “Apple Bloom I raised you as not only my sister but as your mother the best I could. I am honoured that you would want me to be your real one but you sure about this really?” AJ asked and only got a nod as an answer which made Aj sigh and blush deeply. “Alright we are in. Twi give this here little filly what she wants. I’ll do my best as a mother.” She said almost lost on the last word.

“As are we. Sweety Bell is a handful at times but she is my dear sister. All her friends are in on this then I am to give her the same. I don’t think I be a good mother but if my Seeety thinks I be a better mother then older sister then I will try for her.” Rarity said clearing her throat.

“You forgot the other part of the deal sis, well mommy...” Sweety Bell giggles at saying the word. “You have to agree and let let spike be my father.” Hearing her repeat this out loud made Rarity blush deeply as she looked over at the purple dragon as he stretched his wings.

“Fine fine fine. Spike dear, would you please be... be the father of my dear daughter Sweety Bell.” The words where hard to say and each one made her redder in the face.

“Would I? For you Rarity I will do anything. I love you.” Spike said and with that Twi thought Rarity the spell and with the help of Starlight the spell was casted again and now the three friends all where pregnant at the same time spans. Spike was at Rarity’s side helping her adjust to the extra weight. But what he got in return made him deep red, he felt a loving lick from the white unicorn who he had fallen in love with for some time now.

Twilight rested with Rainbow as AJ helped Starlight to her room to rest and Rarity and Spike retreated to her room together.

Weeks passed and into months and the spell was holding fine. The girls getting bigger with time as their fouls grew inside them. All three of them each having their own sense of bliss from this. Rainbow knowing her two girls are safe inside her and she grown very close to Twilight, Rarity and Spike grew very close that ponies really believed she was pregnant with his child. And Apple Jack continued to work until little Apple Bloom was to big to let her and Big Mac took over.

13212122121211212111.content:
Twilight was resting with one very pregnant Rainbow resting her head on the swollen belly and using her spell to see them.” Any day now Dashis and they be here” Twi said softly as she ran her wings over the belly of her friend and now lover. “They are very healthy and you are handling yourself a lot better this time.” She teased the Pegasus thT blushed away and stood up stretching her wings as she trottoff the bed of clouds along the cloud floor. They where up in Dash’s home.

Spike was helping Rarity who was trying to get to the castle for she felt that her little foul would be a little quicker then the other girls. She was so in love with the kindness and help that Spike has given her that she told him that after she recovers from this she wouldn’t mind if they made a sibling for their foul.

Apple Jack was walking along side her brother Big Mac should was bulling a trolly fully of apples for he wouldn’t let her do it considering how close she was now to popping. She admitted she almost thought she was going to last week with fake contractions.

Everyone eventually meet up at the castle and went about their meeting. Pinky Pie had already planned the largest private party for the event already. But she couldn’t plan for the fact that the map glowed with the cutie marks of all four fillies that where inside their mothers above the castle. “Dose this mean it is time?” She asked but was answered with the three pregnant ponies moaning out as they went into labor all at once.

And with little trouble outside of Dash having twins so taking longer all four fouls where born again. Spike held baby Sweety Bell for Rarity as she was resting and cuddled her.

Twilight tended to Scootaloo and you, Dash was so worn out that she passed out even though she was actually nursing you and your sister.

Apple Jack managed on her own with her brother’s help. She just watched her little one as she nursed away. All of them had such a deep bond now with the little fillies that could t be taken from them.

As everypony slept after Pinkie’s party the fouls started to grow and age back to normal. Sweety Bell was snug between Rarity and Spike. Apple Bloom was still nursing in her sleep as she grew. Scootaloo and you where snuggled in the for legs of both your mothers.

When you woke up almost like the instinct of a foul was still there you started nursing from your mother. “Hmm, oh morning little droplet.” Cooed Rainbow Dash as she just let you not really caring that you was older and shouldn’t need to nurse anymore. Instead she helped you make it easier for you. As she was she noticed that on your flank there was a mark. It seemed some how you had gotten your. Cutie mark which was a single droplet falling into two ripples. Twinwoke to see this and giggled at the sight. She cuddled the sleeping Scootaloo as she watched you nurse until Dash stopped you and started to Prun your wings and fix your mane.

“Mommy?” You softly spoke breaking the silence finally. “Please don’t ever leave me.” You yawned as you enjoyed the feeling of her tending to you. Those words light Dash’s face up but caused Teilights face to grow a bit grim. What had she done, you was not of this world and was going to eventually be sent back. But now she felt horrified on the thought of you leaving and wanted you to stay but felt it was wrong to keep you as well.

“Big sis, I mean mum?” Apple Bloom shyly spoke before she felt a foreleg hold her tight and guide her to continue nursing. This made her blush but she didn’t fight it, she willingly did and shed a tear of happiness for what Apple Jack did for her. She. Now had a mommy again.

“It alright sugar, take your fill. Mommy be okay.” AJ said blushing as she watched Apple Bloom happily nurse from her. “I made all that just for you sweet heart.” AJ cooed as she was so happy to be able to give her this. “My little Apple Bloom.” She said the gasped feeling her filly nurse more almost because she was so happy from hearing those words.

“Sweety Bell, come to mommy and have your share.” Rarity cooed as she watched her fully wake up and step away from the dragon that was curled around her. She watched her shyly walk up to her and nodded before the young filly started to nurse as well.

Twi took you as Scootaloo then took her turn and Rainbow just loved it until she was done and started pruning her as well. We all heard AJ giggling as Apple Bloom wasn’t showing any sign of wanting to stop. “Twilight, thank you, I have friends and a family now. I couldn’t be more happy.” You told her which made her blush and hold you close to her.

After a while the four of you ran off to play before passing out for a nap. While you all did that the older ponies where talking about what they just did and how they felt about it. In the end not one of them regretted it. In fact Fluttershy was asking if it work with different animals for she wanted to mother Angel her rabbit friend as well as any sick animal that would need her help. That she want to mother them all and heal them all inside her mothering body. Twilight and Starlight told her that it might not be wise and dangerious one to do that so much and two that not being the same animal might cause her issues just as much. Pinky being who she is asked if could hold a new birthday now for the four of us that was asleep.

choices: You move on and leave Zecora to her fate in the forest. (Evil choice)
You wait for Zeroca to wake up and face your mistakes. (Good Choice)
141212.content:
You didn't knew what it was that made you think THIS would be fun in the beginning, but you knew you had to help her.

The only problem with this was that you couldn't see a way through the flames. "HEY! You need too calm down! Can you see anyway you could get out of there with help from here?" You shout as loud as you can to make sure Zecora would hear you over the fire and her screams for help. You really wish you would know how to use magic now that your an alicorn.

"Thank Celestia you came! There is a window on the opposite of the door, but its blocked from the outeside by something! Please hurry! I is getting hard to breath in here!" Told Zecora you as you heard crashing on the in side of the hut and her coughs shortly after. She didn't seem to have seen you, but you didn't cared about that and ran around the house and saw what blocked the window.

A part of the roof that must have broken down when that bomb went off. It was surprisingly only in flamed in very few places. You tried to force it off the side of the hut but it didn't move a single inch. "It must be stuck somewhere." you though and looked the thing over and soon saw the problem. One of the roof supports was stuck in the gound and the window. Thinking fast you move to one side of the support and placed you hind hoofs between the ground and lower part of it. You dug your front hoofs in the gound before you and kicked it as hard as you could. Again and again you tried and finally it gave away. You gave it another strong kick and sent it flying. You quickly moved out off the way of the falling roof parts and saw that there was now a hole in this side which was probably even Celestia could fit trough with ease.

You looked inside to see that Zecora was already lying on the ground unconscious. You wanted to rush in and get her out, but something was holding you back. All of th sudden you doubted, what you are doing here. "Wait. Why should I risk my live for her. I don't even know her!" You started to think of all the reasons not to save Zecora, but you shook your head to get these thoughts out of your head. "How can i even think that way. I got her into this shit!" you said to yourself and rushed inside.

It was hard to see when you entered the hut cause of all the smoke and the flames. Still, it only took you a moment to find her and the reason why she was unconscious. She was carrying a bag with potions she probably wanted to save and then one of the shelvess fell from the walls and hit her. You moved up to her and somehow were able to pick her up and lift her over back holding Zecora in place with your wings. You ran outside and that no second to soon. Right as you exited through the hole in the wall, the hut collapsed and every thing still inside was lost in the flames which were raging even greater then when the bomb went off.

You ran as far away as you could before you're were feeling exhausted and set Zecora down. But suddenly your head felt like it was getting bashed in with a hammer. You broke down and held your head in your hoofs waiting for the pain to go away. "NOTHING BUT A FAILURE!" Was some deep voice, seeming to be enraged by something, screaming in your head. Instantly after that your head was feeling better.

You looked over to Zecora who seemed to recover and she was sleeping. You were wondering what you should do now.
141212.title: Twisted and Torn Mind.

1412121.content:
You decide to leave Zecora to the fate you put her in "If somebody gave me a bomb to blow up her house I'd guess I should follow through... don't really know why I saved her then... feh." You say with a wave of your hoof as you leave you take to the sky feeling an odd surge of energy you gotta fly fast you just gotta. you flap your wings with greater intensity as you fly even faster soon you see a castle in the distance and you fly right towards it. As you get closer you see many trembling pegasi in armor "Hey what's up with these dudes?" You asked as you trot past them as though something is pulling you away

Later on you are inside the castle wondering around until you trot through a door and see Princess Celestia reading "Wah? Who are you?" You ask looking to Celestia she stood up and turned to you with a look of confusion "You're not dead?" Celestia asked suddenly the energy in you seems stronger "Oh no! I'm not trusting you! I trust you and then BAM my insurance premiums go way up like that KABOOM!!! And who know's what'll happen to the space time continuum!" You yell as you flail your hooves and with a shake of your head you suddenly feel like you weren't yourself for a moment Celestia sighed "I really didn't think I'd see you again or rather YOU not well... you." Celestia said trotting away from the desk "Well no point in going on any longer without telling Luna." Celestia said as she trotted over to a wall and banged on it "Hey Luna he's back!" Celestia called out you look confused "Okay I don't know what the salamander is happening but I want to know now! It's my money and I want it now!" You said feeling that strange energy surge again Luna then trotted in with a warhammer "I'll kill you!" Luna yelled as she swung it down you manage to dodge it "Whoa! I may have blown up a house today but I can say from experience that violence isn't the answer!" You yell as you trot backwards towards Celestia

You then feel a cold knife at your neck "I'm afraid in this case it is." Celestia said cold as the blade at your neck you wrap your foreleg around her's and get the knife out of her hoof you then slide under Celestia as your shaking "Celestia you gotta help me! You're trying to kill me!" You yell in a panic as your voice is quaking "Wait how does he remember your name?" Luna asked in confusion "That's a good question. I didn't expect a memory to stay intact. If he remember's... that. This could be trouble." Celestia then trotted away from you and turned around now looking down at you "Okay how much do you know?" Celestia asked

1412122.content:
Since you had no idea how to get out of this damned forest you thought it would be the best to just wait for Zecora to wake up and then hope she knows where to go. Also you should probably tell her that fire was your fault... of maybe that could wait for later. Yeah that would be the best for now. You looked over to her as you heard a groan.

Zecora was slowly getting up and was tying to see where she was as her eyes took you into focus and she seemed surprised to see that you are an alicorn. She was a good ten feet away from you and there was an akward silence as she was looking all over you. You stared at her in a weird way unable to bring out a word as Zecora got closer to you. But suddenly she stopped about half way to you and she looked at your flank. You wonder why she was looking so intense and finally you knew what she was looking for. A Cutie Mark. You realized as you had woken up that you didn't had any, but still looked at your flank because you felt unsure off how long she was looking at it.

Still nothing. You looked back at Zecora and looked her know directly in her eyes. She seemed to be shocked and scared by your look as you would guess. You got out of your siting position in which you waited for her to wake up. You are worried about the look in your eyes and wanted to calm her down as she seemed really dissolved about what happen and your apperance. "Are you okay?" was all you could get out and you felt really stupid for even asking this question. And for the worse Zecora was now even more nervous about you and started to back off. "Hey, what's wrong? You don't look to good." You said as you took a step in her direction. Not the smartest move in this situation and that move kicked you in the face. Literally.

Zecora emidiantly turned around as you got closer and kick you with her hooves. It hurt like hell and you screamed in pain as she send you flying in the tree behind you. "Back off you mad gone beast!" Zecora screamed at you as you got back up and trying to get a clear vision again from that kick. The next thing you see clearly is one off the potions out off that bag she wears. As that thing hit the ground in front of you It exploded and flames and pieces of the broken glass were comeing in your direction. You jump out of the way of the flames, but the shards still hit you in the flank and left a long bleeding wound,

As you looked up as this scene was over. You saw a how Zecora ran in a direction with the ground covered in moss. After that you blacked out cause of your blood loss.

You wake up after what you guessed have been a few ours since you see a small pond of your blood. You noticed that you head must have been bleeding for a short while since you can feel the dried blood on your snout. It is hard for you to get up since your some of the shards are still in your flank. You start to remove them one by one. "What the hell was wrong with that pony?! I saved her life and she tries to kill me. It was me who endangered it in the first place, but she could know that." You start to think why in the name of hell she would want your death so badly. You take out the last of the shards in your flank. It is like a mirror and big enough for you to see every detail of your new face. You see that there is a small bleeding scar above your right red glowing eye. And something seems to be wrong with your left eye.

It is comepletly grey with your iris being slightly touch of a white-blue and your pupli is streched and thin like the one of a cat. "I look like a total freak with this second changed eye! That zebra is going to pay for turning it like this with her potions!" you say out loud really pissed know as you notice something. Now your left eye has a touch of a red-purple. "Wait a sec... This sin't her fault, is it?" you ask yourself calming down and see your eye change its color to grey. This is extremly crepy to you, but know you got to follow Zecora and find out what was going on and why she creeped out that hard at your look. And if you manage to do that you will tell her that you set her hut on fire.

With a made up mind you head the direction that was covered in moss. Unknown to you at the moment your left eye turned back the way it was when you woke up.

You made it to the edge off the forest and can go now to either Sweet Apple Acers or to Ponyville.

info.brief_description: You wake up in equestria and have adventures with the mane six.
info.description:
You wake up in the MLP:FiM world and meet all the ponies and have adventures wih the mane six or you can be a villain and try to take over equestria.

This is my first story and I don't consider myself a writer so please forgive me if I don't add as much to the story as others.

Ratings/reviews are always welcome I'll like to know what others think of the story.

Seeing as this is my first story ever I really don't want write the story all by myself so chapter adds are greatly appreciated. I will be very happy if this gets even 25 chapters.

Anyway here are the rules:

1. Sexual things are allowed as long as it's not dark in any way.

2. Please try not to put one sentence chapters unless it's necessary.

3.No gay stuff please

4. Make sure your spelling and grammar are UNDERSTANDABLE. Not perfect, but others should be able to read it easily.

5. Keep in 1st person and 2nd person if necessary.

6. Have fun writing
